column1:
""Version"":""2012-10-17"",
    ""Id"":""http referer policy example"",
    ""Statement"":[
      {
        ""Sid"":""Allow get requests originating from www.example.com and example.com."",
        ""Effect"":""Allow"",
        ""Principal"":""*"",
        ""Action"":""s3:GetObject"",
        ""Resource"":""arn:aws:s3:::examplebucket/*"",
        ""Condition"":{
          ""StringLike"":{""aws:Referer"":[""http://www.example.com/*"",""http://example.com/*""]}
        }
      }
    ]
    }
